ygData.subject: Fancy feature in makefile.in
ygData.msgSnippet: This line out of Makfile.in rm -fR @ct_libdir@/* cause some MINOR problems, if you type ./configure --prefix=/usr because in configure the line

This line out of Makfile.in 

           rm -fR @ct_libdir@/*
	
cause some=
 MINOR problems, if you type 

           ./configure --prefix=3D/usr

beca=
use in configure the line

           ct_libdir=3D${prefix}/lib

isn't that=
 optimal.

If you didn't get it till now: I lost all user libraries!
